title: Eurythmics - 1991 - Greatest Hits (European version) [FLAC]
description:
Greatest Hits is a 1991 retrospective compilation album by Eurythmics, containing their successful singles spanning the years 1982 through 1990. It was enormously successful, topping the charts in the UK for a total of 10 weeks and in Australia for 7 weeks. It remains the duo&#039;s best selling album worldwide and has been certified 6x Platinum in the UK and 3x Platinum in the U.S.

The European version of the album contained eighteen tracks, while the version released in the United States contained only fourteen. (The four additional songs on the European edition were "Sexcrime (Nineteen Eighty-Four)," "It&#039;s Alright (Baby&#039;s Coming Back)," "You Have Placed a Chill in My Heart," and "The Miracle of Love.") The track order also differed between the two versions. Neither the European nor the U.S. version of Greatest Hits contained their top 30 hits "Beethoven (I Love To Listen To)" (1987) or "Revival" (1989).

01 - Love Is A Stranger
02 - Sweet Dreams (Are Made Of This)
03 - Who&#039;s That Girl?
04 - Right By Your Side
05 - Here Comes The Rain Again
06 - There Must Be An Angel (Playing With My Heart)
07 - Sisters Are Doin&#039; It For Themselves
08 - It&#039;s Alright (Baby&#039;s Coming Back)
09 - When Tomorrow Comes
10 - You Have Placed A Chill In My Heart
11 - The Miracle Of Love
12 - Sexcrime (Nineteen Eighty-Four)
13 - Thorn In My Side
14 - Don&#039;t Ask Me Why
15 - Angel
16 - Would I Lie To You?
17 - Missionary Man
18 - I Need A Man

All tracks are encoded losslessly in FLAC format (16 bit, stereo, 44.1 kHz). For more information about FLAC visit http://flac.sourceforge.net/. Album summary courtesy of Wikipedia and is available under the terms of the GNU Free Documentation License. Enjoy.
